channel.title: Rock Vs Rap
channel.description: I go for Rock Music is like Candy. You like the Candy and throw the Rappers away!!

item.title: Rock Vs Rap
item.dc:creator: @NewAgeMovement NewAgeMovement
item.description:
@NewAgeMovement wrote:

Thug-life:

A bit off topic but what i find amazing in rap is how rappers will start this so called “beef” with other rappers and it will seem they really do hate each other, wishing death on the other etc. But its funny how if one of them dies the other rapper will make tribute songs and dedicate parts of concerts to them.

Could you give me an example of someone who did this?

Read full topic

A bit off topic but what i find amazing in rap is how rappers will start this so called “beef” with other rappers and it will seem they really do hate each other, wishing death on the other etc. But its funny how if one of them dies the other rapper will make tribute songs and dedicate parts of concerts to them.

item.title: Rock Vs Rap
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:76, topic:190029”][quote author=Original Daniel link=topic=253048.msg2240449#msg2240449 date=1211653710]
I don’t hate mainstream, I hate the talentless artists created by record companies for the purpose of making money using a catchy chorus - Soulja Boy, Akon etc.

50 cent can’t rap, his target audience seems to be wannabe gangster faggots.

I like rap, from artists who can actually rap. I like tech9, eminem, immortal technique, tupac etc.
[/quote]Hah. A friend of mine got me into Akon years ago. I guess that makes me bad too, I suppose. Just like listenin’ to Jeezy. I listen to the good old stuff like Tupac, DMX and biggi, but I do like some of the newer stuff. Not a lot of it I’ll mind you, with all these fake ass beats and pitiful rhymes that make no sense.[/quote]

I like Akon too. I hate some of his songs though.

I know many rap fans will not like akon at all, but some of his songs just sound really good. “Never gonna get it” is my favorite, and I like a few from his newest album.

Read full topic

50 cent can’t rap, his target audience seems to be wannabe gangster faggots.

I like rap, from artists who can actually rap. I like tech9, eminem, immortal technique, tupac etc.[/quote]Hah. A friend of mine got me into Akon years ago. I guess that makes me bad too, I suppose. Not a lot of it I’ll mind you, with all these fake ass beats and pitiful rhymes that make no sense.

item.title: Rock Vs Rap
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

NewAgeMovement:

@Thug-life: He’s fake because he raps about money and girls? Take a look at all the other rappers. What do they rap about? About politics and world peace? Akon is fake, Soulja boy is fake,but 50 aint. Atleast the guy didnt lie about his past. Take a look at The Game. The bitch was a fucking male stripper(i’ve heard). He doens’t have any inspiration no more for his rap songs. That’s why half his songs are about him dissing 50. We got the fucking message you idiot.

You know i never said he is fake because he raps about money on girls, its the things he says, its the things he does, its the way he acts. He is a idiot, go listen to some real hip-hop.

Read full topic

I like rap, from artists who can actually rap. I like tech9, eminem, immortal technique, tupac etc.

item.title: Rock Vs Rap
item.dc:creator: @postmanpat9 postmanpat9
item.description:
@postmanpat9 wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:207766”]Postman Pat. Postman Pat. Postman Pat and his black and white cat.
Early in the morning, just as day is dawning, he picks up all the post bags in his van.

Postman Pat. Postman Pat. Postman Pat and his black and white cat.
All the birds are singing, and the day is just beginning. Pat feels he’s a really happy man.

Everybody knows his bright red van, all his friends will smile as he waves to greet them,
Maybe, you can never be sure, there’ll be knock (knock knock)
Ring (ring ring). Letters through your door. (Hee Hee).

Postman Pat. Postman Pat. Postman Pat and his black and white cat.
All the birds are singing, and the day is just beginning. Pat feels he’s a really happy man.

My favorite song atm.[/quote]

woot! i know postman pat is awesome!

Read full topic

@Thug-life: He’s fake because he raps about money and girls? Take a look at all the other rappers. What do they rap about? About politics and world peace? Akon is fake, Soulja boy is fake,but 50 aint. Atleast the guy didnt lie about his past. Take a look at The Game. The bitch was a fucking male stripper(i’ve heard). He doens’t have any inspiration no more for his rap songs. That’s why half his songs are about him dissing 50. We got the fucking message you idiot.

I listen to a lot of oldschool rap, but I also listen to rap that a lot of you guys don’t like. Ludacris is one of my favorites lol.

I still prefer rock though.[/quote]Nothing wrong with Ludacris, 50 cent is a fucking fagot though.

item.title: Rock Vs Rap
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

Same here! I love that song. I really don’t like rap unless it is good. Not that stupid shit they play on the radio. But yet again, I almost never listen to it. I mostly listen to rock; Chiodos, FFTL, The Devil Wears Prada, We Are the Union. Soooooooooooooooo it’s like emo rock I guess and ska. I don’t like hard metal, I think it’s retarded.
